name: FortaTerra: Save The Planet
description:
Protect your tiny planet from outside threats! Your job is to build defenses on the surface to destroy all incoming threats. Can your planet survive the meteorite barrages and alien swarms, or will it get overwhelmed?

  • 3 types of turrets: The Cannon is the basic turret with fast fire rate and moderate range. The Missile turret has homing missiles and a long range. The Mortar shoots explosive shots with more damage and knockback, but its fire rate is low.
  • 3 types of buildings that provide buffs: The Forest provides slow health regeneration. The Factory buffs nearby turrets with a fire rate boost. The Satellite Dish provides nearby turrets an attack range increase.

Controls:

  • Left Click: Select Building, place new building from blueprint.
  • Right Click or Left Shift: Rotate camera around planet.
  • Scroll: Zoom in/out
  • Number Keys: Display building blueprint.
  • 'U' Key: Upgrade selected building.
  • 'S' Key: Sell selected building.
  • 'Esc'  Key : Delete building blueprint / Deselect building.

The game utilized Unity's Tower Defense Template as a basis to work upon. I was inspired to create an unique spin to the tower defense genre. The current game is the result after a month of work, and I will continue to add new elements over time. If you have any feedback or suggestions for new features, please feel free to put them in the comments below!
